description: The standard a2 script module collection.
name: a2.modules
news:
* ComfortResize
  - repaired double click for maxi/minimize
  - added Double Click thresholds, put in Group
    so the whole thing can be toggled
  - reset mouse cursor on double_click actions
  - new cursor reset code #28
  - now uses new window lib respecting virtual borders
* SessionRestore - now with on demand process fetch
* gtranslate:
  - removed default hotkeys
  - added new language lister
  - online msg added
* getWinfo fixed with new window_get_rect to display window size
* DetailsPopup: lister element data no longer in sub-level element
* New module TaskBarRaiser
  - Makes sure a hidden task bar pops up when a foreground app prevents it.
